directions: Mix chopped mince with capsicum 1 very finely chopped, Tomato 1 deseeded and finely chopped, Onion ½ cup finely chopped, Green chilies 4 chopped, Ginger 1 inch finely chopped, Ginger garlic paste 1 tbsp heaped, Lemon juice 2 tbsp, All spice 1 tsp, Salt 1 tsp, Coriander leaves finely chopped 2 tbsp, Cashew nuts 8 ground into a paste, All spice ½ tsp, Malai 2 tbsp, Bread 1 slice soaked in water and squeezed
Mix all well, shape into small kababs using wet hands, keep in fridge for 1 hour, before frying .
Heat ¼ cup oil in a frying pan, pan fry 3 to 4 kababs on low heat till golden brown, serve hot with chutney
ingredients: Tomato 1 remove seeds and finely chopped
Cashew nuts 8 grinded into a paste
Bread 1 slice soaked in water and squeezed
title: Chapli Kebab (mutton)
